name: ECOMON: Arcade Adventure
description:
Ecomon: Arcade Adventure is the first game of ecomon project. It is simple platform for Web and... Arcade!

Piero & Stef developed a Platform game with their little experience (please, forgive them for occasional bugs or imperfections! They put their all…)

Test your skills in the first Game Adventure of Ecomon, a funny Arcade where you can save the World destroying the Anti-Ecomon. If you’ll complete the game, you’ll can win an important BONUS.

To know more visit: CLICK!
